SELECT DISTINCT scr.id, scr.name, scr.parentid, scr.idorg, scrparent.name as nameDepFather FROM IUSERDEPTHDR scr LEFT JOIN IUSERDEPTHDR scrparent ON scr.parentid = scrparent.id WHERE exists (select distinct us.deptid from IUSERUSERHDR us where us.deptid =scr.id) AND scr.type != 1
AND scr.id != #deptId#
START WITH
scr.idorg = #idsorg[]#
CONNECT BY PRIOR scr.id = scr.parentid
ORDER BY scr.name
